concept.title: PGI 229.7002-3 Value added tax or import duty problem resolution.

conbody.p: In the event a value added tax or import duty problem cannot be resolved at the contracting officerâ€™s level, refer the issue to HQ Third Air Force, Staff Judge Advocate, Unit 4840, Box 45, APO AE 09459. Direct contact with HM Customs and Excise in London is prohibited.
